metadata.name: My North Star ("Nordstern Tales" Theme)
metadata.description:
"My North Star" is the official theme song of "Nordstern Tales"

Lyrics by Bea Francisco & Ian del Carmen  
Music by Jessica Passilongo & Federico Sapia  
Performed by Jessica Passilongo  
Produced by Ian del Carmen  
Copyright Â© 2022 by Deca Labs  
 
333 ERC-1155 non-fungible tokens (NFT) serve as membership to a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) for fractional ownership of the song and voting rights for the future of the song. More info at https://NordsternTales.com

In photo: Kelly Stronghart, one of the lead characters of "Nordstern Tales" aka POTM #7645 from the "Pirates of the Metaverse" by Drip Studios https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0xe75113d4a417c2d33c67fb127b419e5f47c5d62c/7645

NFT holders may also use this Kelly Stronghart POTM #7645 photo as a profile picture or post it on social media.
